name: IdentityServer3Neo4j
tagline: Putting users at the heart of your graph.
body:
# IdentityServer3 + Neo4J = Awesome

Combining the powerful, feature-rich IdentityServer3 from Thinktecture and the leading Graph database means your users become a native part of your application. IdentityServer3 ensures security and flexible while Neo4J means your data closely reflects your domain, and its rich relational capabilities allow you to derive incredible intelligence from the persisted information.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
